verses.verse: וַיִּקָּ֨הֲל֜וּ <WH6950> assembled together כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole עֲדַ֤ת <WH5712> And the whole congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel שִׁלֹ֔ה <WH7887> at Shiloh וַיַּשְׁכִּ֥ינוּ <WH7931> and set up שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> there And the land נִכְבְּשָׁ֖ה <WH3533> was subdued לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

וַיִּוָּֽתְרוּ֙ <WH3498> And there remained בִּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not חָלְק֖וּ <WH2505> which had not yet received אֶת־ <WH853> נַֽחֲלָתָ֑ם <WH5159> their inheritance שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> seven שְׁבָטִֽים׃ <WH7626> tribes

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֙נָה֙ <WH575> How אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> will you מִתְרַפִּ֔ים <WH7503> How long [are] ye slack לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> to go לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> hath given לָכֶ֔ם יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> of your fathers

הָב֥וּ <WH3051> Give out לָכֶ֛ם שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> from among you three אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> men לַשָּׁ֑בֶט <WH7626> for [each] tribe וְאֶשְׁלָחֵ֗ם <WH7971> and I will send וְיָקֻ֜מוּ <WH6965> them and they shall rise וְיִֽתְהַלְּכ֥וּ <WH1980> and go בָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> through the land וְיִכְתְּב֥וּ <WH3789> and describe אוֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> לְפִ֥י <WH6310> it according נַֽחֲלָתָ֖ם <WH5159> to the inheritance וְיָבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> of them and they shall come אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

וְהִֽתְחַלְּק֥וּ <WH2505> And they shall divide אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> לְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> it into seven חֲלָקִ֑ים <WH2506> parts יְהוּדָ֞ה <WH3063> Judah יַעֲמֹ֤ד <WH5975> shall abide עַל־ <WH5921> and גְּבוּלוֹ֙ <WH1366> in their coast מִנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> on the south וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> and the house יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> of Joseph יַעַמְד֥וּ <WH5975> shall abide עַל־ <WH5921> in גְּבוּלָ֖ם <WH1366> in their coasts מִצָּפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> on the north

וְאַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> You תִּכְתְּב֤וּ <WH3789> Ye shall therefore describe אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the land שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> [into] seven חֲלָקִ֔ים <WH2506> parts וַֽהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <WH935> and bring אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> here וְיָרִ֨יתִי <WH3384> [the description] hither to me that I may cast לָכֶ֤ם גּוֹרָל֙ <WH1486> lots פֹּ֔ה <WH6311> here לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> for you here before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God

כִּ֠י <WH3588> because אֵֽין־ <WH369> have חֵ֤לֶק <WH2506> have no part לַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> But the Levites בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֔ם <WH7130> among כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because כְהֻנַּ֥ת <WH3550> you for the priesthood יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD נַחֲלָת֑וֹ <WH5159> [is] their inheritance וְגָ֡ד <WH1410> and Gad וּרְאוּבֵ֡ן <WH7205> and Reuben וַחֲצִי֩ <WH2677> and half שֵׁ֨בֶט <WH7626> the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <WH4519> of Manasseh לָקְח֣וּ <WH3947> have received נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <WH5159> their inheritance מֵעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> beyond לַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> Jordan מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> on the east אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> gave לָהֶ֔ם מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> which Moses עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיָּקֻ֥מוּ <WH6965> arose הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> And the men וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> them that went וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> charged יְהוֹשֻׁ֡עַ <WH3091> and Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> הַהֹלְכִים֩ <WH1980> and walk לִכְתֹּ֨ב <WH3789> to describe אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> the land לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying לְ֠כוּ <WH1980> Go וְהִתְהַלְּכ֨וּ <WH1980> and walk בָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> through the land וְכִתְב֤וּ <WH3789> and describe אוֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> וְשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> it and come again אֵלַ֔י <WH413> for וּ֠פֹה <WH6311> here אַשְׁלִ֨יךְ <WH7993> to me that I may here cast לָכֶ֥ם גּוֹרָ֛ל <WH1486> lots לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> for you before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּשִׁלֹֽה׃ <WH7887> in Shiloh

וַיֵּלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> went הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> And the men וַיַּעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> and passed through בָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land וַיִּכְתְּב֧וּהָ <WH3789> and described לֶֽעָרִ֛ים <WH5892> it by cities לְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> into seven חֲלָקִ֖ים <WH2506> parts עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֑פֶר <WH5612> in a book וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> [again] to Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> to the host שִׁלֹֽה׃ <WH7887> at Shiloh

וַיַּשְׁלֵךְ֩ <WH7993> cast לָהֶ֨ם יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <WH3091> And Joshua גּוֹרָ֛ל <WH1486> lots בְּשִׁלֹ֖ה <WH7887> for them in Shiloh לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיְחַלֶּק־ <WH2505> divided שָׁ֨ם <WH8033> and there יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <WH3091> and there Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> the land לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel כְּמַחְלְקֹתָֽם׃ <WH4256> according to their divisions פ

וַיַּ֗עַל <WH5927> came up גּוֹרַ֛ל <WH1486> And the lot מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> of Benjamin לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> according to their families וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> came forth גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> and the coast גּֽוֹרָלָ֔ם <WH1486> of their lot בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> between the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> between בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the children יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> of Joseph

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> become לָהֶ֧ם הַגְּב֛וּל <WH1366> And their border לִפְאַ֥ת <WH6285> side צָפ֖וֹנָה <WH6828> on the north מִן־ <WH4480> was from הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> was from Jordan וְעָלָ֣ה <WH5927> went up הַגְּבוּל֩ <WH1366> and the border אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּ֨תֶף <WH3802> to the side יְרִיח֜וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho מִצָּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> on the north וְעָלָ֤ה <WH5927> side and went up בָהָר֙ <WH2022> through the mountains יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> westward [וְהָיָה כ] (וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become ק) תֹּֽצְאֹתָ֔יו <WH8444> and the goings out מִדְבַּ֖רָה <WH4057> thereof were at the wilderness בֵּ֥ית אָֽוֶן׃ <WH1007> of Bethaven

וְעָבַר֩ <WH5674> went over מִשָּׁ֨ם <WH8033> there הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> And the border ל֗וּזָה <WH3870> from thence toward Luz אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> to the side ל֙וּזָה֙ <WH3870> of Luz נֶ֔גְבָּה <WH5045> southward הִ֖יא <WH1931> he בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> which [is] Bethel וְיָרַ֤ד <WH3381> descended הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> and the border עַטְר֣וֹת אַדָּ֔ר <WH5853> to Atarothadar עַל־ <WH5921> near הָהָ֕ר <WH2022> near the hill אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which מִנֶּ֥גֶב <WH5045> that [lieth] on the south side לְבֵית־ חֹר֖וֹן <WH1032> Bethhoron תַּחְתּֽוֹן׃ <WH8481> of the nether

וְתָאַ֣ר <WH8388> was drawn הַגְּבוּל֩ <WH1366> And the border וְנָסַ֨ב <WH5437> [thence] and compassed לִפְאַת־ <WH6285> the corner יָ֜ם <WH3220> of the sea נֶ֗גְבָּה <WH5045> southward מִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָר֙ <WH2022> from the hill אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [lieth] before בֵית־ חֹרוֹן֮ <WH1032> Bethhoron נֶגְבָּה֒ <WH5045> southward [וְהָיָה כ] (וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> become ק) תֹֽצְאֹתָ֗יו <WH8444> and the goings out אֶל־ <WH413> about קִרְיַת־ בַּ֙עַל֙ <WH7154> thereof were at Kirjathbaal הִ֚יא <WH1931> he קִרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֔ים <WH7157> which [is] Kirjathjearim עִ֖יר <WH5892> a city בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah זֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise פְּאַת־ <WH6285> quarter יָֽם׃ <WH3220> this [was] the west

וּפְאַת־ <WH6285> quarter נֶ֕גְבָּה <WH5045> And the south מִקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> [was] from the end קִרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֑ים <WH7157> of Kirjathjearim וְיָצָ֤א <WH3318> went out הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> and the border יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> on the west וְיָצָ֕א <WH3318> and went out אֶל־ <WH413> to מַעְיַ֖ן <WH4599> to the well מֵ֥י <WH4325> of waters נֶפְתּֽוֹחַ׃ <WH5318> of Nephtoah

וְיָרַ֨ד <WH3381> came down הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> And the border אֶל־ <WH413> to קְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> to the end הָהָ֗ר <WH2022> of the mountain אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> that [lieth] before גֵּ֣י <WH1516> the valley בֶן־ <WH1121> of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <WH2011> of Hinnom אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> [and] which [is] in the valley רְפָאִ֖ים <WH7497> of the giants צָפ֑וֹנָה <WH6828> on the north וְיָרַד֩ <WH3381> and descended גֵּ֨י <WH1516> to the valley הִנֹּ֜ם <WH2011> of Hinnom אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> to the side הַיְבוּסִי֙ <WH2983> of Jebusi נֶ֔גְבָּה <WH5045> on the south וְיָרַ֖ד <WH3381> and descended עֵ֥ין רֹגֵֽל׃ <WH5883> to Enrogel

וְתָאַ֣ר <WH8388> And was drawn מִצָּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> from the north וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> and went forth עֵ֣ין שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH5885> to Enshemesh וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> and went forth אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּלִיל֔וֹת <WH1553> toward Geliloth אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נֹ֖כַח <WH5227> which [is] over against מַעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4608> the going up אֲדֻמִּ֑ים <WH131> of Adummim וְיָרַ֕ד <WH3381> and descended אֶ֥בֶן <WH68> to the stone בֹּ֖הַן <WH932> of Bohan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <WH7205> of Reuben

וְעָבַ֛ר <WH5674> And passed along אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּ֥תֶף <WH3802> toward the side מוּל־ <WH4136> over against הָֽעֲרָבָ֖ה <WH6160> Arabah צָפ֑וֹנָה <WH6828> northward וְיָרַ֖ד <WH3381> and went down הָעֲרָבָֽתָה׃ <WH6160> unto Arabah

וְעָבַ֨ר <WH5674> passed along הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> And the border אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּ֣תֶף <WH3802> to the side בֵּית־ חָגְלָה֮ <WH1031> of Bethhoglah צָפוֹנָה֒ <WH6828> northward [וְהָיָה כ] (וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> become ק) [תֹּצְאֹותָיו כ] (תֹּצְאֹ֣ות <WH8444> plenty ק) הַגְּב֗וּל <WH1366> of the border אֶל־ <WH413> about לְשׁ֤וֹן <WH3956> bay יָם־ <WH3220> sea הַמֶּ֙לַח֙ <WH4417> of the salt צָפ֔וֹנָה <WH6828> were at the north אֶל־ <WH413> about קְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> end הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> of Jordan נֶ֑גְבָּה <WH5045> at the south זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> coast נֶֽגֶב׃ <WH5045> this [was] the south

וְהַיַּרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> And Jordan יִגְבֹּל־ <WH1379> was the border אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לִפְאַת־ <WH6285> side קֵ֑דְמָה <WH6924> of it on the east זֹ֡את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַת֩ <WH5159> This [was] the inheritance בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> of the children בִנְיָמִ֧ן <WH1144> of Benjamin לִגְבֽוּלֹתֶ֛יהָ <WH1367> by the coasts סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> thereof round about לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families

וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> become הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> Now the cities לְמַטֵּ֛ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> of Benjamin לְמִשְׁפְּחֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4940> according to their families יְרִיח֥וֹ <WH3405> were Jericho וּבֵית־ חָגְלָ֖ה <WH1031> and Bethhoglah וְעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> and the valley קְצִֽיץ׃ <WH7104> of Keziz
וּבֵ֧ית הָֽעֲרָבָ֛ה <WH1026> And Betharabah וּצְמָרַ֖יִם <WH6787> and Zemaraim וּבֵֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <WH1008> and Bethel
וְהָעַוִּ֥ים <WH5761> And Avim וְהַפָּרָ֖ה <WH6511> and Parah וְעָפְרָֽה׃ <WH6084> and Ophrah

וּכְפַ֧ר [הָעַמֹּנִי כ] (הָֽעַמֹּנָ֛ה <WH3726> Chefar-haamonai ק) וְהָֽעָפְנִ֖י <WH6078> and Ophni וָגָ֑בַע <WH1387> and Gaba עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities שְׁתֵּים־ <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> with their villages
גִּבְע֥וֹן <WH1391> Gibeon וְהָֽרָמָ֖ה <WH7414> and Ramah וּבְאֵרֽוֹת׃ <WH881> and Beeroth
וְהַמִּצְפֶּ֥ה <WH4708> And Mizpeh וְהַכְּפִירָ֖ה <WH3716> and Chephirah וְהַמֹּצָֽה׃ <WH4681> and Mozah
וְרֶ֥קֶם <WH7552> And Rekem וְיִרְפְּאֵ֖ל <WH3416> and Irpeel וְתַרְאֲלָֽה׃ <WH8634> and Taralah

וְצֵלַ֡ע <WH6762> And Zelah הָאֶ֜לֶף <WH507> Eleph וְהַיְבוּסִ֨י <WH2983> and Jebusi הִ֤יא <WH1931> he יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> which [is] Jerusalem גִּבְעַ֣ת <WH1394> Gibeath קִרְיַ֔ת <WH7157> [and] Kirjath עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities אַרְבַּֽע־ <WH702> four עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen וְחַצְרֵיהֶ֑ן <WH2691> with their villages זֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise נַֽחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> This [is] the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> of Benjamin לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families פ
